line_1: ON GOD supreme our Hope depends,
line_2: Ev'n to the pathless Realms extends

line_1: Whose omnipresent Sight
line_2: Of uncreated Night.

line_1: Ev'n to the pathless Realms extends
line_2: ON GOD supreme our Hope depends,

line_1: Of uncreated Night.
line_2: Whose omnipresent Sight

line_1: Plung'd in th' Abyss of deep Distress,
line_2: His Mercy bad our Sorrows cease,

line_1: To Him we rais'd our Cry:
line_2: And fill'd our Tongue with Joy.

line_1: His Mercy bad our Sorrows cease,
line_2: Plung'd in th' Abyss of deep Distress,

line_1: And fill'd our Tongue with Joy.
line_2: To Him we rais'd our Cry:

line_1: Tho' Earth her ancient Seat forsake
line_2: Tho' her self-balanc'd Fabrick shake,

line_1: By Pangs convulsive torn,
line_2: And ruin'd Nature mourn:

line_1: Tho' her self-balanc'd Fabrick shake,
line_2: Tho' Earth her ancient Seat forsake

line_1: And ruin'd Nature mourn:
line_2: By Pangs convulsive torn,

line_1: Tho' Hills be in the Ocean lost
line_2: No Fear shall e'er disturb the Just,

line_1: With all their trembling Load,
line_2: Or shake his Trust in GOD.

line_1: No Fear shall e'er disturb the Just,
line_2: Tho' Hills be in the Ocean lost

line_1: Or shake his Trust in GOD.
line_2: With all their trembling Load,

line_1: Nations remote and Realms unknown
line_2: For lo! Jehovah's Voice is shewn,

line_1: In vain resist his Sway;
line_2: And Earth shall melt away.

line_1: For lo! Jehovah's Voice is shewn,
line_2: Nations remote and Realms unknown

line_1: And Earth shall melt away.
line_2: In vain resist his Sway;

line_1: Let War's devouring Surges rise
line_2: The Lord of Hosts our Safeguard is,

line_1: And swell on ev'ry Side:
line_2: And Jacob's GOD our Guide.
